data.title: Bart Simpson's Chalkboard
data.statement:
Bart has been naughty yet again, and Mrs Krabappel (Edna) has given him a phrase to fill up the chalkboard with, as his punishment.
Help him please.

Notes:
‣ A word cannot be split between lines
‣ There is a single space between phrases
‣ Even if a phrase cannot be fully written, write as much as you can (full words only)



~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Phrases are from
https://www.ebaumsworld.com/pictures/the-best-from-bart-simpsons-chalkboard/80961238/

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
4
12
I NO LONGER WANT MY MTV
testCases.testOut:
|I NO LONGER |
|WANT MY MTV |
|I NO LONGER |
|WANT MY MTV |

data.constraints:
‣ [[widthOfChalkboard]] ≥ length of longest word in [[phraseBartNeedsToWriteRepeatedly]]
‣ There are no hyphenated words or punctuation
data.stubGenerator:
read heightOfChalkboard:int
read widthOfChalkboard:int
read phraseBartNeedsToWriteRepeatedly:string(100)
write The Chalkboard, filled up
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1: >> An integer [[heightOfChalkboard]]
<<Line 2: >> An integer [[widthOfChalkboard]], not including the side-borders
<<Line 3: >> A string [[phraseBartNeedsToWriteRepeatedly]], denoting the moral lesson Bart needs to absorb via repetition
data.outputDescription: <<Multiple Lines: >> The filled-up chalkboard, including {{|}} to indicate the sides-borders of it

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Bart has been naughty yet again, and Mrs Krabappel (Edna) has given him a phrase to fill up the chalkboard with, as his punishment.
Help him please.

Notes:
‣ A word cannot be split between lines
‣ There is a single space between phrases
‣ Even if a phrase cannot be fully written, write as much as you can (full words only)



~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Phrases are from
https://www.ebaumsworld.com/pictures/the-best-from-bart-simpsons-chalkboard/80961238/
Input
Line 1: An integer heightOfChalkboard
Line 2: An integer widthOfChalkboard, not including the side-borders
Line 3: A string phraseBartNeedsToWriteRepeatedly, denoting the moral lesson Bart needs to absorb via repetition
Output
Multiple Lines: The filled-up chalkboard, including | to indicate the sides-borders of it
Constraints
‣ widthOfChalkboard ≥ length of longest word in phraseBartNeedsToWriteRepeatedly
‣ There are no hyphenated words or punctuation
Example
Input
4
12
I NO LONGER WANT MY MTV
Output
|I NO LONGER |
|WANT MY MTV |
|I NO LONGER |
|WANT MY MTV |
